FuncDef: The display fwm vxlan statistics command displays VXLAN module statistics on a specified board. The display fwm vxlan statistics command displays VXLAN module statistics on a specified board. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display fwm vxlan { l2subif | bridge-domain | tunnel | evpn | oam } statistics [ all ] slot <slotid>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display fwm vxlan bridge-domain statistics slot 1
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to check the delivery of each sub-service of the VXLAN modules. This command displays statistics in a list. Each line indicates a piece of statistics.
